Dynamic resource allocation: Assign compute to active tasks based on priority.
Low-latency context management: Minimize time for snapback, reflective pauses, and external action validation.
Parallel execution: Tasks can operate concurrently, with safe synchronization for shared resources.
Modular scalability: New tasks, models, or sensors can be added without disrupting existing operations.
Predictive caching: Frequently used Mascot logs, task checkpoints, and DCX computations are cached to reduce recomputation.
